revised_title: Obituary of William Crookes: A Pioneering Scientist
tldr: This obituary celebrates the life and achievements of William Crookes, a renowned scientist who made significant contributions to the fields of chemistry and physics. Crookes is best known for his discovery of thallium, the development of the Crookes tube, and his work on spectroscopy. His dedication to accuracy and his innovative research led to numerous awards and a lasting impact on the scientific community.
